newsitem.title: GREECE: GREEK WARRANTS HALT TRADE ON MAY 26 BANK HOLIDAY.
newsitem.headline: GREEK WARRANTS HALT TRADE ON MAY 26 BANK HOLIDAY.

text.p: Warrants on Greek instruments will not be traded on Monday, May 26 due to a bank holiday.

Merrill Lynch and ING Barings, issue and market-makers to seven warrants on Greek equities and benchmark indices, will not quote prices on Monday as Western European bourses are winding down business on a bank holiday. --Angelos Kiosklis, Athens Newsroom +301 3311812-4
